turkish_example_sentence: Siz bize gerekli izin vermeseniz, seyahat yapamayız.
english_example_sentence: If you were not to give us the necessary permission, we could not travel.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы вы не дали нам необходимое разрешение, мы не смогли бы путешествовать.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Siz bize gerekli izin ______, seyahat yapamayız.
